Verses: 1 idharkuppinbu, Apsalom Radhangalaiyum Kudhiraigalaiyum, Thanakku Mun Oda Aimbadhu Sevagaraiyum Sambaadhiththaan.

2 melum Apsalom Kaalaithorum Ezhundhirundhu, Pattanaththu Vaasalukkup Pogira Vazhi Oraththile Nindrukondu, Evanaagilum Thanakku Irukkira Vazhakku Mugaandharamaai Raajaavinidaththil Nyaayaththirkaagap Pogumpodhu, Avanai Azhaiththu, Nee Endha Ooraan Endru Ketpaan; Avan Umadhu Adiyaan Isravel Koththirangalil Ondrukkaduththa Inna Ooraan Endraal,
3 appozhudhu Apsalom Avanai Nokki: Idho, Un Kaariyam Nermaiyum Nyaayamumaayirukkiradhu: Aanaalum Raajaavinidaththile Un Kaariyaththai Visaarippaar Oruvarum Illai Enbaan.
4 pinnum Apsalom Vazhakku Vyaajyamullavargal Ellaarum Ennidaththil Vandhu, Naan Avargalukku Nyaayancheyyumpadikku, Ennai Dhesaththile Nyaayaadhipadhiyaaga Vaiththaal Nalamaayirukkum Enbaan.
5 evanaagilum Oruvan Avanai Vanangavarumpodhu, Avan Than Kaiyai Neetti Avanaith Thazhuvi, Muththancheyvaan.
6 indhappragaaramaaga Apsalom Raajaavinidaththil Nyaayaththirkaaga Varum Isravelarukkellaam Seydhu, Isravel Manusharudaiya Irudhayaththaik Kavarndhukondaan.
7 naarpadhu Varusham Sendrapinbu, Apsalom Raajaavai Nokki: Naan Karththarukkup Pannina En Poruththanaiyai Ebronil Seluththumpadikku Naan Poga Uththaravukodum.

8 karththar Ennai Erusalemukkuth Thirumbi Varappanninaal, Karththarukku Aaraadhanai Seyven Endru Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Naan Seeriyaadhesaththil Kesoorile Kudiyirukkumpodhu, Poruththanaipanninen Endraan.
9 adharku Raajaa, Samaadhaanaththodepo Endraan; Appozhudhu Avan Ezhundhu Ebronukkup Ponaan.
10 apsalom Isravel Koththirangalukkellaam Vevukaararai Anuppi, Neengal Ekkaalaththoniyaik Ketkumpodhu, Apsalom Ebronile Raajaavaanaan Endru Sollungal Endru Sollachcholli Vaiththirundhaan.
11 erusalemilirundhu Varavazhaikkappatta Irunooruper Apsalomode Koodapponaargal; Avargal Vanjagamindri Ariyaamaiyinaal Ponaargal.

12 apsalom Paligalai Seluththumpodhu, Dhaaveedhin Aalosanaikkaaranaagiya Agiththoppel Ennum Keeloniyanaiyum Avan Ooraagiya Keelovilirundhu Varavazhaippiththaan; Appadiye Kattuppaadu Balaththu, Janangal Apsalominidaththil Thiralaai Vandhu Koodinaargal.
13 adhai Arivikkira Oruvan Dhaaveedhinidaththil Vandhu, Isravelil Ovvoruvarudaiya Irudhayamum Apsalomaippatrippogiradhu Endraan.

14 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Erusalemile Thannidaththilulla Thannudaiya Ellaa Oozhiyakkaararaiyum Nokki: Ezhundhu Odippovom, Illaavittaal Naam Apsalomukkuth Thappa Idamillai; Avan Theeviriththu Nammidaththil Vandhu, Nammaip Pidiththu, Nammel Pollaappu Varappanni, Nagaraththaip Pattayakkarukkinaal Sangaarampannaadhapadikkuth Theeviramaaip Purappadungal Endraan.
15 raajaavin Oozhiyakkaarar Raajaavaip Paarththu: Idho, Raajaavaagiya Engal Aandavan Kattalaiyidum Kaariyaththaiyellaam Seyya Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Aayaththamaayirukkirom Endraargal.
16 appadiye Raajaavum Avanudaiya Veettaar Ellaarum Kaalnadaiyaaip Purappattaargal, Veettaikkaakka Raajaa Marumanaiyaattigalaagiya Paththu Sthreegalaip Pinvaiththaan.
17 raajaavum Samastha Janangalum Kaalnadaiyaaip Purappattu, Satruththoorampoi, Oru Idaththile Thariththu Nindraargal.

18 avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarum, Kireththiyar Yaavarum Pileththiyar Yaavarum Avan Pakkaththile Nadandhuponaargal; Kaaththoorilirundhu Kaalnadaiyaai Vandhirundha Arunooruperaagiya Kiththiyar Ellaarum Raajaavukkumunbaaga Nadandhaargal.
19 appozhudhu Raajaa Kiththiyanaagiya Eeththaayaip Paarththu: Nee Engaludanekooda Varuvaanen? Nee Thirumbippoi, Raajaavudanekooda Iru; Nee Anniyadhesaththaan, Nee Un Idaththirkuth Thirumbippogalaam.

20 nee Netrudhaane Vandhaai; Indrunaan Unnai Engalode Nadandhuvarumpadikku Azhaiththukkondu Pogalaamaa? Naan Pogakkoodiya Idaththirkuppogiren; Nee Un Sagodhararaiyum Azhaiththukkondu Thirumbippo; Kirubaiyum Unmaiyum Unnode Iruppadhaaga Endraan.

21 aanaalum Eeththaai Raajaavukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga Raajaavaagiya En Aandavan Engeyiruppaaro, Ange Umadhu Adiyaanum, Seththaalum Pizhaiththaalum, Iruppaan Endru Karththarudaiya Jeevanaiyum Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanudaiya Jeevanaiyum Kondu Sollugiren Endraan.
22 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Eeththaayai Nokki: Nadandhuvaa Endraan: Appadiye Kiththiyanaagiya Eeththaayum Avanudaiya Ellaa Manusharum Avanodirukkira Ellaap Pillaigalum Nadandhuponaargal.

23 sagala Janangalum Nadandhupogirapodhu, Dhesaththaar Ellaarum Magaa Saththamaai Azhudhaargal; Raajaa Keedharon Aatraik Kadandhaan; Janangal Ellaarum Vanaandharaththirkup Pogira Vazhiye Nadandhuponaargal.

24 saadhokkum Dhevanudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyai Avanodekooda Irundhu Sumakkira Sagala Leviyarum Vandhu, Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Ange Vaiththaargal; Janangal Ellaarum Nagaraththilirundhu Kadanthudheerumattum, Abiyaththaar Thirumbippoyirundhaan.

25 raajaa Saadhokkai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Nagaraththirkuth Thirumbak Kondupo; Karththarudaiya Kangalil Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhaanaal, Naan Adhaiyum Avar Vaasasthalaththaiyum Paarkkiradharku, Ennaiththirumba Varappannuvaar.
26 avar: Unmel Enakkup Piriyamillai Enbaaraagil, Idho, Inge Irukkiren; Avar Thammudaiya Paarvaikku Nalamaanapadi Enakku Seyvaaraaga Endraan.

27 pinnum Raajaa Aasaariyanaagiya Saadhokkai Nokki: Nee Gnaanadhrushtikkaaran Allavo? Nee Samaadhaanaththode Nagaraththirkuth Thirumbu; Un Magan Agimaasum Abiyaththaarin Magan Yonaththaanumaagiya Ungal Kumaarar Iranduperum Ungalodekoodath Thirumbip Pogattum.
28 enakku Arivikkiradharku Ungalidaththilirundhu Seydhivarumattum, Naan Vanaandharaththin Veligalile Thariththiruppen Endraan.
29 appadiye Saadhokkum Abiyaththaarum Dhevanudaiya Pettiyai Erusalemukkuth Thirumbak Kondupoi, Ange Irundhaargal.
30 dhaaveedhu Than Mugaththai Moodi, Verunkaalaal Nadandhu Azhudhukondu Olivamalaiyinmel Eripponaan; Avanodirundha Sagala Janangalum Mugaththai Moodi Azhudhukondu Erinaargal.

31 apsalomode Kattuppaadupanninavargaludan Agiththoppelum Serndhirukkiraan Endru Dhaaveedhukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Dhaaveedhu, Karththaave, Agiththoppelin Aalosanaiyaip Payiththiyamaakkividuveeraaga Endraan.

32 dhaaveedhu Malaiyin Uchchimattumvandhu, Ange Dhevanaip Panindhukondapodhu, Idho, Arkiyanaagiya Oosaai Than Vasthiraththaik Kizhiththukkondu, Thalaiyinmel Puzhudhiyaippottukkondavanaai Avanukku Edhirppattaan.
33 dhaaveedhu Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Ennodekooda Nadandhuvandhaal Enakku Baaramaayiruppaai.

34 nee Nagaraththirkuth Thirumbippoi, Apsalomai Nokki: Raajaave, Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaayiruppen; Munbu Naan Ummudaiya Thagappanukku Oozhiyakkaaranaayirundhen; Ippodhu Naan Umakku Oozhiyakkaaran Endraayeyaagil, Enakkaaga Agiththoppelin Aalosanaiyai Abaththamaakkuvaai.

35 unnode Ange Saadhok Abiyaththaar Ennum Aasaariyargal Irukkiraargal Allavaa? Raajaavin Veettile Pirakkira Edhedhu Seydhi Undo, Ennenna Kelvippadugiraayo, Adhaiyellaam Saadhok Abiyaththaar Ennum Aasaariyargalukku Arivippaai.

36 ange Avargalode Saadhokkin Magan Agimaasum Abiyaththaarin Magan Yonaththaanum, Avargal Irandu Kumaararum Irukkiraargal; Neengal Kelvippadugira Seydhiyaiyellaam Avargalvasamaai Enakku Anuppuveergalaaga Endraan.
37 appadiye Dhaaveedhin Snegidhanaagiya Oosaai Nagaraththirku Vandhaan; Apsalomum Erusalemukku Vandhaan.
